title: VA - Super Breaks (1999) (FLAC)
description:
SUPER BREAKS. "Essential funk, soul and jazz samples and break beats." Original music later sampled by hip hop artists and others. All songs are complete and transferred from original analogue master tapes and remastered.

Ripped with Exact Audio Copy V0.99 prebeta 4 in secure mode. Losslessly compressed with FLAC 1.2.1. <a href="
http://www.discogs.com/release/569677" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.discogs.com/release/569677</a>

Released: 1999
Genre:    Funk / Soul, Jazz
Style:    Jazz-Funk, Soul, Funk, Disco
